parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The SSL server name.

The name must be 1 to 100 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the SSL server.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The resource group ID of the SSL server.

The SSL server and its associated VPN gateway belong to the same resource group. You can call the [DescribeVpnGateway](~~2794055~~) operation to query the ID of the resource group to which the VPN gateway belongs.

parameters.name: SslVpnServerId
parameters.description: The ID of the SSL server.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN gateway.
